privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: At Chuan Min Fusion, we are committed to protecting your privacy.
privacyPage.infoCollected: We collect information such as your name and email.
privacyPage.infoUsage: We use your information to process orders.
privacyPage.infoDisclosure: We do not share your information with third parties.
privacyPage.accessCorrection: You can request access and correction of your information.
privacyPage.cookies: We use cookies to improve your experience.
privacyPage.changes: We regularly update our privacy policy.
privacyPage.contact: If you have questions, please contact us.

useConditions.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
useConditions.websiteUsage: The content is for general information only.
useConditions.intellectualProperty: The content is protected by copyright.
useConditions.links: We are not responsible for linked content.
useConditions.liability: We do not guarantee the accuracy of the information.
useConditions.governingLaw: The use of the site is subject to the laws of Spain.
